1301050.name: Fantasy Grounds - Underworld Player's Guide
1301050.description:
Underworld Player's Guide

An alliance of cultists, ghouls, and vampires. A scheme of the dark gods against humanity. New maps, dark realms, monstrous societies!
A few torches, and a mountain of courage. That's all it takes to go down into the lands of endless darkness.
Allied with vampires, the darakhul of the Ghoul Imperium turn their attention to the surface. Emperor Nicoforus the Pale remains wary of further expansion, but others are not satisfied with caution. These ghouls have set plans in motion to gain further control of the surface world and spread their dark religion across the land.
This product includes:
  • An
    Underworld Player's Guide
    softcover book of new player options
  • New underworld races
  • New subclasses and tools
  • New backgrounds
  • New undead-themed spells.
Converted by:  
Linda Buth
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
